post.author: psychoart
post.body:
hi all , i work like game artist , now i try to create my simple game with Doom 3 editor , but i don't have nothing programing skils



low poly + normalmap


low poly + diffuse texture


low poly + diffuse texture + normal map

post.author: Rayne
post.body:
You deserve a 8+ !

It looks really really great!


Just a couple of things: may you post the UV layout? I can't see any uv seam , you hide them really well


And the polycount: it's 2700 but the screenshots show models made with quads... You should post screenshots with the model "tripled"..

Beside that, congratulations, it looks so good!

post.author: Shikamaru
post.body:
hey geeze nice monster .............. i cant wait for its release !
any chance on a completion date ?

post.author: modern
post.body:
Hey, solid stuff!

I'd say the feet look alittlesmall and undefined. I think your model could do with talons and teeth. Also, I would use noselfshadows in the material because I can see a couple of nasty shadows that disrupt what is otherwise a really very nice piece of work.

post.author: Rayne
post.body: Very Silent Hill-ish

post.author: Marineofuac
post.body: very nice, i think the feet and the mouth area should have some blood type splatter.
